content.raw:
Take a look at 72d12e6, I refactored visual infos a bit so now we can also return information on all visuals or all plugins.

The test was never getting the visuals because apparently you need a camera in the test. I copied a snippet from one of the tests above and now the tests work.

I didn't add tests for failure cases, but I think it would be a good idea to. It would be good to check if we are forgetting any corner cases.
content.html:
Take a look at 72d12e6, I refactored visual infos a bit so now we can also return information on all visuals or all plugins.

The test was never getting the visuals because apparently you need a camera in the test. I copied a snippet from one of the tests above and now the tests work.

I didn't add tests for failure cases, but I think it would be a good idea to. It would be good to check if we are forgetting any corner cases.
